duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and maintain all pricing strategy for DSD/Warehouse items based on established criteria as set forth by the Merchandising department.
Enter Cost/Retail adjustment sheets into the Biceps system and maintain Store/Vendor information in the Biceps system.
Build/Maintain pricing groups in formatted Excel Spreadsheets based on market checks received and track/enter/audit pricing changes in systems based on established rules.
Resolve time cost discrepancies on supplier invoices and complete other assigned duties.
